access: Varisian ethnicity or New Thassilon nationality
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Arcane Tattoos](/Feats.aspx?ID=938) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 11 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Access**
Varisian ethnicity or New Thassilon nationality

</column>

---

You have tattoos on your body corresponding to one of the ancient Thassilonian schools of magic. Choose one of the following schools of magic: abjuration ([_shield_](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)), conjuration ([_tanglefoot_](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)), enchantment ([_daze_](/Spells.aspx?ID=61)), evocation ([_electric arc_](/Spells.aspx?ID=97)), illusion ([_ghost sound_](/Spells.aspx?ID=132)), necromancy ([_chill touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=35)), or transmutation ([_sigil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)). You can cast the associated cantrip (listed in parentheses) as an innate arcane spell at will.

<title level="2">Arcane Tattoos leads to...</title>
[Ornate Tattoo](/Feats.aspx?ID=951)
name: Arcane Tattoos
